description: Responsibilities include greeting visitors, answering the telephone, scheduling tours and responding to constituent requests for general information and other inquiries. This position also monitors delivery and pickup of materials, maintains the front office, and assists with various administrative duties. The Staff Assistant must maintain a good relationship with the Member, staff and constituents, accept performance based criticism and direction, and work well under pressure. The applicant must be prepared to work a flexible schedule.
responsibilities: Responding to constituent requests for general information and other inquiries
Monitoring delivery and pickup of materials
Maintaining a good relationship with the Member, staff and constituents
Accepting performance based criticism and direction
Prepared to work a flexible schedule
qualifications: Previous Hill experience preferred but not required
how_to_apply: Please send cover letter and resume to castaffassistant1996@gmail.com. No phone calls or drop-ins please.

description: The District Director will oversee management and operation of two District offices, serve as a key liaison to local organizations and elected officials, and develop and implement long-term strategic plans.
qualifications: Strong oral and written communications skills
Self-motivation and outreach experience to local and state organizations
A thorough understanding of the federal legislative process
The ability to multi-task, work well under pressure and the flexibility to work long hours, including nights and weekends
Ties to California's 36th Congressional District are preferred
how_to_apply: To apply for the District Director position, please send cover letter and resume to CA36DistrictDirectorposition@mail.house.gov with “District Director” in the subject line. No phone calls, drop-ins or faxes.
salary_info: Salary commensurate with experience. This is NOT an entry-level position.
equal_opportunity: The office is an equal opportunity employer.

description: U.S. Rep. Lloyd Doggett (D-Texas) seeks a press secretary for his Washington office. Spanish skills and Hill experience a plus.
how_to_apply: Send resume, brief writing sample, and three references to DoggettJobs@mail.house.gov. No drop-ins please.
